name: textclickingsimulator
description:
This is the game that requires full dedication of the person. To play this game, you must game absolutely nothing to do which will give you the will to stay in one spot doing one task for multiple hours.  

Why is it just text?  To prove to the world that you don't need any artistic ability to make a game. You just need the knowledge to make one.

How to play the game?

Click to win!
